name: Arcadia: Rise of Cataclysm
description:
Entry for Mini Jam: Neon & Weekly Jam 157

Arcadia, the neon city is in danger. Protect it from the evil forces that are made by man. Use coins to build an empire of towers and destroy the root cause of evil!

Developer - bartosz.mazur90 

Artist - SinigangShake 

Soundtrack Composer and Game Audio Designer - Derek Wagner

*This game will still be expanded*
